replies.body: get it because he's a pussy
you play ALOT of rengar. Who do you play when he is banned?

> [{quoted}](name=Coolbluey,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=0mOEj2BK,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2015-04-07T03:58:08.711+0000)
>
> you play ALOT of rengar. Who do you play when he is banned?

Rengar gets banned?

The only time he gets banned is when i get matched against the same people i just rekt, they just insta ban Rengar cause they're scared lol, either that or when someone dodges queue and i get back into champ select with the same the people that were in my queue might end up on the enemy team so they know ima pick Rengar.
Sion, Rek'Sai, Shen and Tryndamere are my backups, i also dodge occasionally.

Rengar should get an omega squad skin which should make him look the alien off of predator and during the duration of his invisibility the enemies have to look like what they would if you were looking at them through thermal goggles.

i had 100% with sion, for 8 games, then lost 2 in a row, so sitting on 80%.

I remember when hecarim was released I mained him , the old philosophers stone, heart of gold path, stacking money for days, had a solid win rate of like 82%

I had 100% winrate on jungle singed for a while, its sitting at about 70% now.
I tried jungle singe for a few games.. Takes ages to stack up and you're screwed like jg twitch if you stuffup.. But i find it is fun and pretty good for ganking ey..
Honestly if your W/L ratio is below 80% stop playing that champ until you get good.
